Sentencas: It was found in our previous study that a ceria (CeO2)-assisted Pt catalyst coated on a modified, tablet-shape alpha-Al2O3 support, i.e., Pt/CeO2/alpha-Al2O3, exhibited excellent coking resistance for reforming of natural gas with a high conversion rate and long lifetime.

Sentencas: Taking into accounts both the cost and the performance of the catalyst, the one with 0.5%Pt/12%CeO2/alpha-Al2O3 catalyst composition is screened out to be the best.
